name: boilerplate-uni-app-vue2
description: A boilerplate for vue-cli and uni-app (vue2).

scripts.build:app-plus: cross-env UNI_PLATFORM=app-plus UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/app-plus vue-cli-service uni-build --report --mode production
scripts.build:h5: cross-env UNI_PLATFORM=h5 UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/h5 vue-cli-service uni-build --report --mode production
scripts.build:mp-360: cross-env UNI_PLATFORM=mp-360 UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/mp-360 vue-cli-service uni-build --report --mode production
scripts.build:mp-alipay: cross-env UNI_PLATFORM=mp-alipay UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/mp-alipay vue-cli-service uni-build --report --mode production && node patch-mp-alipay.js
scripts.build:mp-baidu: cross-env UNI_PLATFORM=mp-baidu UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/mp-baidu vue-cli-service uni-build --report --mode production
scripts.build:mp-kuaishou: cross-env UNI_PLATFORM=mp-kuaishou UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/mp-kuaishou vue-cli-service uni-build --report --mode production
scripts.build:mp-qq: cross-env UNI_PLATFORM=mp-qq UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/mp-qq vue-cli-service uni-build --report --mode production
scripts.build:mp-toutiao: cross-env UNI_PLATFORM=mp-toutiao UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/mp-toutiao vue-cli-service uni-build --report --mode production
scripts.build:mp-weixin: cross-env UNI_PLATFORM=mp-weixin UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/mp-weixin vue-cli-service uni-build --report --mode production
scripts.build:quickapp-native: cross-env UNI_PLATFORM=quickapp-native UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/quickapp-native vue-cli-service uni-build --report --mode production
scripts.build:quickapp-webview: cross-env UNI_PLATFORM=quickapp-webview UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/quickapp-webview vue-cli-service uni-build --report --mode production
scripts.dev:app-plus: cross-env UNI_PLATFORM=app-plus UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/app-plus vue-cli-service uni-build --mode development --watch
scripts.dev:h5: cross-env UNI_PLATFORM=h5 UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/h5 vue-cli-service uni-serve --mode development
scripts.dev:mp-360: cross-env UNI_PLATFORM=mp-360 UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/mp-360 vue-cli-service uni-build --mode development --watch
scripts.dev:mp-alipay: cross-env UNI_PLATFORM=mp-alipay UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/mp-alipay vue-cli-service uni-build --mode development --watch
scripts.dev:mp-baidu: cross-env UNI_PLATFORM=mp-baidu UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/mp-baidu vue-cli-service uni-build --mode development --watch
scripts.dev:mp-kuaishou: cross-env UNI_PLATFORM=mp-kuaishou UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/mp-kuaishou vue-cli-service uni-build --mode development --watch
scripts.dev:mp-qq: cross-env UNI_PLATFORM=mp-qq UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/mp-qq vue-cli-service uni-build --mode development --watch
scripts.dev:mp-toutiao: cross-env UNI_PLATFORM=mp-toutiao UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/mp-toutiao vue-cli-service uni-build --mode development --watch
scripts.dev:mp-weixin: cross-env UNI_PLATFORM=mp-weixin UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/mp-weixin vue-cli-service uni-build --mode development --watch
scripts.dev:quickapp-native: cross-env UNI_PLATFORM=quickapp-native UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/quickapp-native vue-cli-service uni-build --mode development --watch
scripts.dev:quickapp-webview: cross-env UNI_PLATFORM=quickapp-webview UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/quickapp-webview vue-cli-service uni-build --mode development --watch
scripts.lint: yarn run lint:eslint && yarn run lint:markdownlint && yarn run lint:stylelint
